name: birb (demo)
description:
birb

This is a demo of the upcoming game, birb, from lazy dev games. It's a platformer made in GB Studio, and will feature multiple levels, hidden secrets, collectible trading cards, and more! 

This demo has 3 stages + Secrets for you to enjoy.

Features

  • In this game, you're a birb.
  • Fight off the bad birds, who are real jerks.
  • Collect the coins to get a big score, because that's cool.
  • Find the trading cards to prove you played all the levels to your friends.
  • Unlock more  by finding all the secret stuff.
  • Use the dedicated chirp button to be cute as heck.

Controls:

  • A / Z: Jump (nice)
  • B / X: Shoot an Egg (eww)
  • Up + A/Z: Big Jump (cool)
  • Down: Block Enemy Eggs (whoa)
  • Left/Right: Move  (go go go)
  • Start / Enter: Pause (brb)
  • Select / Shift: Chirp (cute)

Credits

Game design, scripting, and art by Dan Enders. The demo's music is by Krumel,  sourced from GB Studio community assets. Special thanks to Chris Maltby for desiging GB Studio in the first place!
